COMMAND.INFO_DESC: Displays general information, version number, and uptime.
COMMAND.CHUCK_DESC: Displays a random Chuck Norris fact.
COMMAND.CHUCK_ERR: Could not retrieve a Chuck Norris fact. ;_;
COMMAND.CHANNEL_DESC: **(Admin)** Sets the channel for CyTube announcements. If no channel is mentioned, CyBorg will announce in the channel in which the command is used.
COMMAND.CHANNEL_ERR: Could not find a valid channel.
